verses.text: \w Behold|strong="H2005"\w* \w my|strong="H3605"\w* \w eye|strong="H5869"\w* hath \w seen|strong="H7200"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w these|strong="H3605"\w* \w things|strong="H3605"\w*, \w and|strong="H5869"\w* \w my|strong="H3605"\w* \w ear|strong="H0241"\w* hath \w heard|strong="H8085"\w* \w them|strong="H7200"\w*, \w and|strong="H5869"\w* \w I|strong="H2005"\w* \w have|strong="H5869"\w* \w understood|strong="H0995"\w* \w them|strong="H7200"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w*.

\w According|strong="H4480"\w* \w to|strong="H4480"\w* \w your|strong="H3045"\w* \w knowledge|strong="H1847"\w* \w I|strong="H0589"\w* \w also|strong="H1571"\w* \w know|strong="H3045"\w*: \w neither|strong="H3808"\w* \w am|strong="H0589"\w* \w I|strong="H0589"\w* \w inferior|strong="H5307"\w* \w to|strong="H4480"\w* \w you|strong="H3045"\w*.

\w But|strong="H0199"\w* \w yet|strong="H3198"\w* \w I|strong="H0589"\w* \w will|strong="H0589"\w* \w speak|strong="H1696"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H0413"\w* \w Almighty|strong="H7706"\w*, \w and|strong="H1696"\w* \w I|strong="H0589"\w* \w desire|strong="H2654"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w reason|strong="H3198"\w* \w with|strong="H0413"\w* \w God|strong="H0410"\w*.

Having first shewn \w that|strong="H3605"\w* \w you|strong="H0859"\w* \w are|strong="H0859"\w* forgers \w of|strong="H3605"\w* \w lies|strong="H8267"\w*, \w and|strong="H3605"\w* maintainers \w of|strong="H3605"\w* perverse opinions.

\w And|strong="H2451"\w* \w I|strong="H5414"\w* \w wish|strong="H4310"\w* \w you|strong="H5414"\w* \w would|strong="H4310"\w* \w hold|strong="H5414"\w* \w your|strong="H5414"\w* peace, \w that|strong="H1961"\w* \w you|strong="H5414"\w* might \w be|strong="H1961"\w* thought \w to|strong="H1961"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w wise|strong="H2451"\w* men.

\w Hear|strong="H8085"\w* ye therefore \w my|strong="H8085"\w* \w reproof|strong="H8433"\w*, \w and|strong="H8085"\w* attend \w to|strong="H8085"\w* \w the|strong="H8085"\w* judgment \w of|strong="H8085"\w* \w my|strong="H8085"\w* \w lips|strong="H8193"\w*.

Hath \w God|strong="H0410"\w* any need \w of|strong="H0410"\w* \w your|strong="H1696"\w* lie, that \w you|strong="H1696"\w* should \w speak|strong="H1696"\w* \w deceitfully|strong="H7423"\w* for \w him|strong="H1696"\w*?

\w Do|strong="H0518"\w* \w you|strong="H0518"\w* accept \w his|strong="H5375"\w* person, \w and|strong="H6440"\w* \w do|strong="H0518"\w* \w you|strong="H0518"\w* endeavour \w to|strong="H6440"\w* \w judge|strong="H7378"\w* \w for|strong="H0518"\w* \w God|strong="H0410"\w*?

\w Or|strong="H0518"\w* shall \w it|strong="H0518"\w* please \w him|strong="H0853"\w*, \w from|strong="H0853"\w* \w whom|strong="H0582"\w* \w nothing|strong="H0518"\w* \w can|strong="H0518"\w* \w be|strong="H0582"\w* concealed? \w or|strong="H0518"\w* shall \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w be|strong="H0582"\w* deceived \w as|strong="H3588"\w* \w a|strong="H3588"\w* \w man|strong="H0582"\w*, \w with|strong="H0518"\w* \w your|strong="H3588"\w* deceitful dealings?

\w He|strong="H0518"\w* \w shall|strong="H6440"\w* \w reprove|strong="H3198"\w* \w you|strong="H0518"\w*, \w because|strong="H6440"\w* \w in|strong="H6440"\w* secret \w you|strong="H0518"\w* accept \w his|strong="H5375"\w* \w person|strong="H3198"\w*.

As soon as \w he|strong="H3808"\w* \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* move \w himself|strong="H3808"\w*, \w he|strong="H3808"\w* \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* trouble \w you|strong="H5921"\w*: \w and|strong="H0853"\w* \w his|strong="H5921"\w* \w dread|strong="H6343"\w* \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* \w fall|strong="H5307"\w* \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* \w you|strong="H5921"\w*.
Your \w remembrance|strong="H2146"\w* shall be compared to \w ashes|strong="H0665"\w*, \w and|strong="H2146"\w* your necks shall be brought to clay.

Hold \w your|strong="H5921"\w* peace \w a|strong="H4480"\w* little \w while|strong="H5921"\w*, \w that|strong="H4480"\w* \w I|strong="H0589"\w* \w may|strong="H4480"\w* \w speak|strong="H1696"\w* whatsoever \w my|strong="H5921"\w* mind \w shall|strong="H4100"\w* suggest \w to|strong="H1696"\w* \w me|strong="H5921"\w*.

\w Why|strong="H4100"\w* \w do|strong="H4100"\w* \w I|strong="H7760"\w* tear \w my|strong="H7760"\w* \w flesh|strong="H1320"\w* \w with|strong="H5921"\w* \w my|strong="H7760"\w* \w teeth|strong="H8127"\w*, \w and|strong="H3709"\w* \w carry|strong="H5375"\w* \w my|strong="H7760"\w* \w soul|strong="H5315"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w my|strong="H7760"\w* \w hands|strong="H3709"\w*?

\w Although|strong="H3808"\w* \w he|strong="H3808"\w* \w should|strong="H0413"\w* bill \w me|strong="H0413"\w*, \w I|strong="H2005"\w* \w will|strong="H3808"\w* trust \w in|strong="H0413"\w* \w him|strong="H0413"\w*: \w but|strong="H0389"\w* \w yet|strong="H0389"\w* \w I|strong="H2005"\w* \w will|strong="H3808"\w* \w reprove|strong="H3198"\w* \w my|strong="H6440"\w* \w ways|strong="H1870"\w* \w in|strong="H0413"\w* \w his|strong="H6440"\w* \w sight|strong="H6440"\w*.

\w And|strong="H0935"\w* \w he|strong="H1931"\w* \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* \w my|strong="H0935"\w* saviour: \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w no|strong="H3808"\w* hypocrite \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* \w come|strong="H0935"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w his|strong="H0935"\w* \w presence|strong="H6440"\w*.
\w Hear|strong="H8085"\w* ye \w my|strong="H8085"\w* \w speech|strong="H4405"\w*, \w and|strong="H8085"\w* receive \w with|strong="H8085"\w* Sour \w ears|strong="H0241"\w* hidden truths.

\w If|strong="H3588"\w* \w I|strong="H0589"\w* \w shall|strong="H3045"\w* \w be|strong="H4994"\w* \w judged|strong="H4941"\w*, \w I|strong="H0589"\w* \w know|strong="H3045"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w I|strong="H0589"\w* \w shall|strong="H3045"\w* \w be|strong="H4994"\w* \w found|strong="H3045"\w* \w just|strong="H4941"\w*.

\w Who|strong="H4310"\w* \w is|strong="H1931"\w* \w he|strong="H1931"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H4310"\w* \w plead|strong="H7378"\w* \w against|strong="H7378"\w* \w me|strong="H5978"\w*? \w let|strong="H6258"\w* \w him|strong="H1931"\w* come: \w why|strong="H3588"\w* am \w I|strong="H3588"\w* consumed holding \w my|strong="H3588"\w* peace?

\w Two|strong="H8147"\w* \w things|strong="H8147"\w* \w only|strong="H0389"\w* \w do|strong="H6213"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w to|strong="H6440"\w* \w me|strong="H6440"\w*, \w and|strong="H6440"\w* \w then|strong="H0227"\w* \w from|strong="H6440"\w* thy \w face|strong="H6440"\w* \w I|strong="H0227"\w* \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* \w hid|strong="H5641"\w*:

Withdraw thy \w hand|strong="H3709"\w* \w far|strong="H7368"\w* \w from|strong="H5921"\w* \w me|strong="H5921"\w*, \w and|strong="H3709"\w* \w let|strong="H0408"\w* \w not|strong="H0408"\w* thy \w dread|strong="H0367"\w* \w terrify|strong="H1204"\w* \w me|strong="H5921"\w*.

\w Call|strong="H7121"\w* \w me|strong="H7725"\w*, \w and|strong="H7725"\w* \w I|strong="H0595"\w* \w will|strong="H7725"\w* \w answer|strong="H6030"\w* thee: \w or|strong="H0176"\w* \w else|strong="H0176"\w* \w I|strong="H0595"\w* \w will|strong="H7725"\w* \w speak|strong="H1696"\w*, \w and|strong="H7725"\w* do thou \w answer|strong="H6030"\w* \w me|strong="H7725"\w*.

\w How|strong="H4100"\w* \w many|strong="H4100"\w* \w are|strong="H4100"\w* \w my|strong="H3045"\w* \w iniquities|strong="H5771"\w* \w and|strong="H3045"\w* \w sins|strong="H2403"\w*? \w make|strong="H3045"\w* \w me|strong="H4100"\w* \w know|strong="H3045"\w* \w my|strong="H3045"\w* \w crimes|strong="H6588"\w* \w and|strong="H3045"\w* offences.
\w Why|strong="H4100"\w* hidest thou thy \w face|strong="H6440"\w*, \w and|strong="H6440"\w* thinkest \w me|strong="H6440"\w* thy \w enemy|strong="H0341"\w*?

Against \w a|strong="H7291"\w* \w leaf|strong="H5929"\w*, that is carried \w away|strong="H5086"\w* \w with|strong="H0853"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* wind, thou shewest thy power, \w and|strong="H0853"\w* thou pursuest \w a|strong="H7291"\w* \w dry|strong="H3002"\w* \w straw|strong="H7179"\w*.

\w For|strong="H3588"\w* thou writest \w bitter|strong="H4846"\w* \w things|strong="H4846"\w* \w against|strong="H5921"\w* \w me|strong="H5921"\w*, \w and|strong="H5771"\w* wilt consume \w me|strong="H5921"\w* \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w sins|strong="H5771"\w* \w of|strong="H5921"\w* \w my|strong="H5921"\w* \w youth|strong="H5271"\w*.

Thou hast \w put|strong="H7760"\w* \w my|strong="H3605"\w* \w feet|strong="H7272"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w stocks|strong="H5465"\w*, \w and|strong="H7272"\w* hast \w observed|strong="H8104"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w my|strong="H3605"\w* \w paths|strong="H0734"\w*, \w and|strong="H7272"\w* hast considered \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w steps|strong="H7272"\w* \w of|strong="H5921"\w* \w my|strong="H3605"\w* \w feet|strong="H7272"\w*:

\w Who|strong="H1931"\w* am \w to|strong="H0398"\w* \w be|strong="H1931"\w* \w consumed|strong="H0398"\w* \w as|strong="H0398"\w* \w rottenness|strong="H7538"\w*, \w and|strong="H0398"\w* \w as|strong="H0398"\w* \w a|strong="H0398"\w* \w garment|strong="H0899"\w* \w that|strong="H1931"\w* \w is|strong="H1931"\w* moth-eaten.
